id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this pca9685 component. Use this if you have multiple PCA9685s connected at the same time

*See also: [pca9685 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#configuration-variables)*

frequency.docs:
**float**: The frequency to let the component drive all PWM outputs at. Must be in range from 24Hz to 1525.88Hz. Defaults to `1000Hz`.

*See also: [pca9685 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#configuration-variables)*

external_clock_input.docs:
**bool**: Enable external clock input. PRE_SCALE register will by set to 3. Default to `false`.

*See also: [pca9685 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#configuration-variables)*

address.docs:
**int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x40`.

*See also: [pca9685 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [PCA9685 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#id2)*

pca9685_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [PCA9685 hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#pca9685-component). Use this if you have multiple PCA9685s you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [PCA9685 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#id2)*

channel.docs:
**int**: Choose the channel of the PCA9685 of this output component. Must be in range from 0 to 15.

*See also: [PCA9685 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/pca9685.html#id2)*
